Oh, I see, you already do.  So test it out.  Mount it and create a file and check the perms.  Just make sure you are writing to a directory that has permissions which allow it.
umask=000 is equivalent to having the default attributes on newly created files set to mode 777.  You want, "umask=000" in your fstab, not chmod.
